mapper.select: SELECT chat.uid uid, chat.chat_id chat_id, chat.name name, chat.disabled disabled, COALESCE(COUNT(message.chat_id), 0) message_count, profile.uid "profile.uid", profile.file_size "profile.file_size", profile.file_unique_id "profile.file_unique_id", profile.local_file_path "profile.local_file_path", profile.last_modified "profile.last_modified", profile.exist "profile.exist" FROM chat LEFT JOIN message ON message.chat_id = chat.chat_id LEFT JOIN file profile ON profile.file_unique_id = chat.file_unique_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} # GROUP BY chat.chat_id
